### Contact Us

1. **City of DuPont**
2. 1700 Civic Drive | DuPont, WA 98327
3. Phone: (253) 964-8121 | Fax: (253) 964-3554
4. Hours: Monday - Thursday 9:00 am - 4:00 pm | Fridays by appointment only
